item.Route: sdafasdf
item.Highlights: We are proud to offer you a Great programme with Great prices during the 10th year of our Company. To protect you experiencing long bus rides, we have arranged an itinerary that includes domestic flights with short bus rides. We are offering you the best touristic Destinations of Turkey, the best and foremost museums of our country with informative and experienced guides, comfortable cars, Great breakfasts, lunches and dinners. We will also have some surprises for you during our tours. To have fun, travel around and meet with new people, do not miss out our special programme for our 10th anniversary
